## guaranteeAuthoringContentTypeAction variable

Loads the content type if it does not exist. If the type does not exist, this triggers a [loadAuthoringContentTypeAction](./redux-feature-auth-type.loadauthoringcontenttypeaction.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
guaranteeAuthoringContentTypeAction: UnaryFunction<string, GuaranteeAuthoringContentTypeAction>
```
